title: exceed the 20% of developed area of such POS
clause_text: exceed the 20% of developed area of such POS. However, in exceptional cases the said limit may be allowed to be exceeded with special permission of the Commissioner. Specific permission of Municipal Corporation shall be obtained for constructing underground DSS/RSS/EHVRS and shall be subject to terms and conditions and applicable payment. Such allotted POS shall be developed and maintained by the concerned Electric Distribution Company at its own cost and will have to be kept open for the use of general public except minimum area required for ingress and egress as per Regulation 53.

source_pdf.text_snippet: exceed the 20% of developed area of such POS. However, in exceptional cases the said limit may be allowed to be exceeded with special permission of the Commissioner. Specific permission of Municipal C
